content.question:
“Religion supplies the pretext and gold the motive.”
This statement was a contemporary characterization of

choices.label: the launching of the Spanish Armada
the posting of the Ninety-five Theses
new religious orders such as the Ursulines and Jesuits
Spanish and Portuguese expansion in the New World

content.answer: Spanish and Portuguese expansion in the New World

topic.text: 1.11: Causation in the Renaissance and Age of Discovery

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
